thread.title: Top 10 Gay and Lesbian Clubs in Prague
thread.title_full: Top 10 Gay and Lesbian Clubs in Prague

title: Top 10 Gay and Lesbian Clubs in Prague
text:
Updated Articles and Resources 
Prague's nightlife is a 24-hour affair, and everybody's welcome. Gay and lesbian clubs in Prague offer visitors a night of unlimited dancing or an intimate setting for a few friends. First-time visitors to Prague might try Drake's or The Saints first, to check out the gay and lesbian club scene. Termix is larger and Gejzee..r a little sweatier. Friends is a great place to hang out alone or with others. So take your pick and enjoy gay Prague to the fullest when the sun goes down. 
Don't forget Prague's other clubs:
